context.description: The EclipseNSIS editor is used to edit NullSoft Installer scripts.
The EclipseNSIS console shows the output of an NSIS script compilation process.
The EclipseNSIS preferences page is used to set global settings for NSIS scripts.
The EclipseNSIS Editor preferences page is used to customize the look and feel of the EclipseNSIS editor.
The EclipseNSIS Templates preferences page is used to work with code templates.
The EclipseNSIS Task Tags preferences page is used to configure task tags.
The EclipseNSIS Script Templates preferences page is used to work with script templates.
The EclipseNSIS Template Editor dialog is used to create new and edit existing code templates.
The EclipseNSIS Script Template Editor dialog is used to create new and edit existing script templates.
The EclipseNSIS properties page is used to set custom NSIS compilation options for a particular script.
The NSIS Script Wizard provides a guide through the process of generating an NSIS script.
The Welcome page provides an introduction to the Script Wizard.
The General Information page is used to collect some general, mainly required, information about the NSIS script and installer.
The Installer Attributes page is used to specify installation locations and languages.
The Installer Attributes page is used to customize how the installer presents itself to the user.
The Installer Contents page is used to manage installer contents.
The Wizard Completion page is used to specify some final items before script generation.
This dialog is used to add or edit information about a file to be included in the installer.
This dialog is used to add or edit information about a group of files to be included in the installer.
This dialog is used to add or edit information about a fiolder to be included in the installer.
This dialog is used to add or edit information about a shortcut to be included in the installer.
This dialog is used to add or edit information about a registry key to be included in the installer.
This dialog is used to add or edit information about a registry value to be included in the installer.
This dialog is used to add or edit information about a Section to be included in the installer.
This dialog is used to add or edit information about a SectionGroup to be included in the installer.
This tab is used to edit NSIS options for the current NSIS Script launch configuration.
This tab is used to define NSIS symbols for the current NSIS Script launch configuration.
This tab is used to edit common options for the current NSIS Script launch configuration.
This tab is used to edit NSIS options for the current NSIS Script project builder configuration.
This tab is used to define NSIS symbols for the current NSIS Script project builder configuration.
This tab is used specify build options for the current NSIS Script project builder configuration.
The NSIS Configuration Wizard is used to configure EclipseNSIS with an NSIS installation.
The NSIS Manual Configuration Wizard is used to configure EclipseNSIS by manually specifying the location of the NSIS installation.
The NSIS Update Wizard is used to configure EclipseNSIS by using NSIS Update to download and install NSIS software.
The NSIS Update Preference page is used to configure NSIS Update behavior.
The Automatic NSIS Updates Preference page is used to configure NSIS Update to automatically search for updates to NSIS on a scheduled basis.
